Html:
Hi,

I'm using all the new versions of my nuget page and now for the first time the rateit package. When I install the package I won't get any files on my system. Only the nuget packages.config is adjusted.
I'm developing a MVC 3 internet application. I also tryed to create a new application with the package but then I get the same problem.

Can somebody help me with this problem?

What is the project you try to add it to (MVC, Webforms etc)? Which VS edition?
I'll try to reproduce your bug, in the meantime you can download the files at http://rateit.codeplex.com/releases/view/55958

Thanks for submitting your problem.

Gidon


On Wed, Sep 28, 2011 at 2:20 PM, LockTar <notifications@codeplex.com> wrote:

From: LockTar

Hi,

I'm using all the new versions of my nuget page and now for the first time the rateit package. When I install the package I won't get any files on my system. Only the nuget packages.config is adjusted.
Can somebody help me with this problem?

Hi Gidon,

I'm developing a new MVC 3 Internet Application in Visual Studio 2010 Ultimate. I have all the latest updates for framework 4, mvc 3, Nuget and VS. My OS is Windows 7 Enterprise x64.

Thanks

Like you said, somehow the package didn't contain any files. I repacked it, and updated the package version (now version 1.2.1), so it should pop up in your nuget  "package update list"

Once again, thanks for reporting the bug!

Gidon
